entries.content: Starting UI design session with Moti. Focus: user message design (.message.message-user). Found current implementation uses metallic card design with shine effect, context badges, and dark container. Located key files: message-cards.css, message-container.css. Moti wants to learn and discuss design together.

Moti wants user message container to use same fill as options dropdown menu: --black-gradient background + --metallic-shine overlay + blue border rgba(122, 162, 247, 0.15) + backdrop-filter blur(16px), but without hover effects. This will create visual consistency across UI components.

Repositioned context badges (text/image) to top-right corner of user message container using absolute positioning. Enhanced badge styling with darker background (rgba 0,0,0,0.6), backdrop blur, blue-tinted border, shadow, and hover effects for better visibility as overlay. This creates cleaner message flow without footer interruption.
